author: AramayisPetrosyan
body:
PR description:

adding 2021 scripts (based on 2019 ones) to the test directory
CondTools/Geometry/test/writehelpers
per request of Ianna Osborne @ianna
PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -s is OK
if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No need for backporting.

It's a resubmission with updates of closed PR
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27693
title: Adding 2021 scripts to CondTools/Geometry
